title: Dotted Decimal Dance
description: Find numbers that show prices or measurements with exactly two decimal places after the dot.
solutionSummary: This pattern matches decimal numbers with exactly 2 decimal places. The \d+ means 'one or more digits' before the decimal point, \. is an escaped dot (since dot normally matches any character), and \d{2} means 'exactly 2 digits' after the decimal point.
